q1.question: Is StockAlert really free?
q1.answer: Yes! The basic version of StockAlert is completely free with no time limits. Premium features are available for power users who need more.

q2.question: Does it work on Mac or Linux?
q2.answer: Currently, StockAlert is only available for Windows. Mac and Linux versions are on our roadmap for future development.

q3.question: How often is market data updated?
q3.answer: Market data is updated in real-time during market hours, with a minimal delay of 1-2 seconds for most quotes.

q4.question: Can I use it with multiple monitors?
q4.answer: Absolutely! StockAlert is designed to work great with multi-monitor setups. You can position alerts on any screen.

overview.title: 1. Overview
overview.content: StockAlert is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and your rights regarding your data. We believe in transparency and minimal data collection.

collection.title: 2. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect minimal data necessary to provide and improve our service:

items.usage: Anonymous usage statistics (features used, error reports)
items.device: Basic device information (OS version, app version)

items.stocks: Your specific stock watchlists or portfolio data
items.alerts: Your alert configurations or trading strategies

localStorage.title: 4. Local Data Storage
localStorage.content: All your watchlists, alerts, and preferences are stored locally on your device. This data never leaves your computer and is not transmitted to our servers. You maintain complete control over your data.

thirdParty.title: 5. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: StockAlert uses third-party APIs to fetch real-time market data. These providers have their own privacy policies. We do not share any personal information with these providers; only anonymous market data requests are made.

security.title: 6. Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect any data we do collect. All network communications use encrypted HTTPS connections. Your local data is stored using standard Windows security mechanisms.

children.title: 7. Children's Privacy
children.content: StockAlert is not intended for use by children under 18. We do not knowingly collect information from children. If you believe a child has provided us with information, please contact us immediately.

changes.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify users of any material changes through the application or our website. Your continued use of StockAlert after changes constitutes acceptance.
